description: Returns summaries of the organization's groups.

parameters.name: OrganizationId
parameters.description: The identifier for the organization under which the groups exist.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: Limit the search results based on the filter criteria. Only one filter per request is supported. NamePrefix (string) --- Filters only groups with the provided name prefix. PrimaryEmailPrefix (string) --- Filters only groups with the provided primary email prefix. State (string) --- Filters only groups with the provided state.

nested_params.name: NamePrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only groups with the provided name prefix.

nested_params.name: PrimaryEmailPrefix
nested_params.description: Filters only groups with the provided primary email prefix.

nested_params.name: State
nested_params.description: Filters only groups with the provided state.

nested_items.name: Groups
nested_items.description: The overview of groups for an organization.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the group, which can be ENABLED, DISABLED, or DELETED.

nested_items.name: EnabledDate
nested_items.description: The date indicating when the group was enabled for WorkMail use.

nested_items.name: DisabledDate
nested_items.description: The date indicating when the group was disabled from WorkMail use.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. The value is 'null' when there are no more results to return.
